original_text: Then the men in ambush hurried and rushed against Gibeah; the men in ambush moved out and struck all the city with the edge of the sword.
korean_text: 복병이 급히 나와 기브아로 돌격하고 나아가며 칼날로 온 성읍을 쳤음이더라

sentences.original_text: Then the men in ambush hurried
the men in ambush moved out
and struck all the city with the edge of the sword
